underlying_goal: Debug and fix broken analytics system for LinkedIn and Twitter, create a formal spec for the fixes, and prepare a handover for the next session
friction_detail: Claude initially summarized existing analytics implementation instead of searching for the spec as requested, and user had to interrupt a premature spec draft to invoke the proper spec-builder skill.
brief_summary: User wanted to debug broken analytics (LinkedIn/Twitter), create a formal spec for fixes, and do a handover; Claude identified the root cause (key mismatch), built the spec after correction, and completed the handover.
